sense.def:
Confusion
pomeni, da se o neki osebi ali stvari zmotimo in mislimo, da je neka druga oseba ali stvar.

seg.quote: There is danger of confusion between them.

sense.def:
Confusion
je tudi položaj, v katerem ni jasno, kaj se dogaja.

seg.quote: In all the confusion, both men managed to grab me.

sense.def:
Kadar so naše misli
in a state of confusion
, ne vemo, kaj naj verjamemo ali storimo.

seg.quote: Her answers to his questions have only added to his confusion.
